    • Method Detail

      • emailExists

        boolean emailExists(java.lang.String email)
                    throws CampusException
        Check if the entered email exists in the database
        Returns:
        true : if the email exists
        false : if the email doesn't exist
        Throws:
        CampusException

      • passwordMatchWithEmail

        boolean passwordMatchWithEmail(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Check if the entered password match with the database password for the provided email
        Parameters:
        email - : the view entered email
        password - : the view entered password
        Returns:
        true : if the encrypted entered password match with the email attached password in the database
        false : if the encrypted entered password doesn't match with the email attached password in the database
